Hello! My name is Edward Johnson

I'm a fresh Computer science graduate, based in Florida's capital city, Tallahassee. I am in the process of applying for master's programs in computational science. I am also looking for back-end / full stack software engineering positions, or similar internships. I have a background in biochemistry, and I am a proficient, highly driven, problem solver. I would ideally like to find a position that works closely with material sciences, machine learning, or low-level embedded systems.
